text: Pelahatchie Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Pelahatchie is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "place where a hurricane passed along and blew down the timber". Variant names are "Pelahatchee Creek" and "Pelahatches Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Rankin County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Scott County, Mississippi
title: Pelahatchie Creek
